overview: Breaking the Waves tells the story of Bess McNeill, a religious young woman with a deep love for her husband Jan, a handsome oil rig worker. When Jan becomes paralyzed in an off-shore accident, Bessâ€™s marital vows are put to the test as he encourages her to seek other lovers and return to his bedside to tell him of her sexual activities.
title: Breaking the Waves - Opera Philadelphia
